titles.title: Federal Employee Base Closure Retirement Act

To amend title 5, United States Code, to modify the early-retirement reduction provisions with respect to certain Federal employees who are separated from service due to a base closure under title II of the Defense Authorization Amendments and Base Closure and Realignment Act, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Federal Employee Base Closure Retirement Act - Amends Federal law to modify the early-retirement reduction provisions with respect to certain Federal employees who are law enforcement officers or air traffic controllers and who are separated from service due to a closure or realignment of a military installation under the Defense Authorization Amendments and Base Closure and Realignment Act.
